RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Professora Titular da Universidade Federal de Pernambuco - UFPE, Ph.D. em Typography Graphic Communication pela The University of Reading (1998), Graduada em Comunicaзгo Visual pela Universidade Federal de Pernambuco (1980). Lнder dos grupos de Pesquisa em Design da Informaзгo (2001) e RIDE - Rede Internacional em Design/Educaзгo (2015). Membro da The Ephemera Society (UK), do Comitк Cientнfico do Archives George Henry Luquet (Franзa), da InfoDesign e Estudos em Design, da Sociedade Brasileira de Design da Informaзгo - SBDI, do Laboratуrio de Prбticas Grбficas - LPG, do Laboratуrio de Visualizaзгo e Sentidos - VISSE e do Grupo de Pesquisa Memorбveis: Manifestaзхes Grбficas Afetivas. Tem experiкncia na бrea de Design da Informaзгo, Linguagem Grбfica, Design/Educaзгo, Memуria Grбfica e Artefatos Educacionais.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: Full Professor at the Federal University of Pernambuco - UFPE, Ph.D. from The University of Reading - Typography Graphic Communication (1998), Advanced Typographic Design from the London College of Printing (1983), graduated in Visual Communication from UFPE (1980). Leader of the Research Groups in Information Design (2001) and RIDE - International Network in Design/Education (2015). Member of the Scientific Committee of the Archives George Henry Luquet (France), and the InfoDesign and Estudos em Design (Brazil). Member of The Ephemera Society (UK), Lab of Graphic Practices - LPG, Lab of Visualization and Senses VISSE (UFPE). Has experience in: Information Design, Graphic Language, Design/Education, Graphic Memory, and Educational Artifacts.

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO:
A pesquisa objetiva propor conteъdos de design grбfico, especificamente aqueles relacionados com os da linguagem grбfica (verbal-numйrica, pictуrica e esquemбtica) no ensino fundamental brasileiro. 
Hipуtese: Os elementos da linguagem grбfica contribuem para o desenvolvimento da cultura visual no ambiente educacional no Brasil. 
Objetivos especнficos que se pхem sгo: 1) Investigar a legislaзгo em vigor no paнs (LDB e PCNs), e a sua adequaзгo aos contextos, externo e interno а escola; 2) Conhecer a adoзгo dos PCNs, na prбtica escolar quanto а construзгo da linguagem visual; 3) Identificar quais os elementos do design grбfico (linguagem grбfica) pode constituir em conteъdos curriculares apropriados para a construзгo de uma cultura visual; 4) Desenvolver uma metodologia para adoзгo desses conteъdos no currнculo do ensino fundamental brasileiro.

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: O estudo do processo de Desenho de Memуria (ordem curta) de crianзas do Brasil e da Franзa
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO:
Contexto da Investigaзгo: 
O processo de desenho de cinco grupos de crianзas com idade entre 5 a 12 anos, matriculadas em quatro escolas do Recife e Paris. 

Abordagem da Pesquisa: 
Estudo descritivo e longitudinal de carбter etnogrбfico sobre a representaзгo pictуrica de crianзas na escola. Estudo comparativo e trans-cultural entre o continente de crianзas das escolas do Recife e aquelas das escolas de Paris. 

Hipуtese: 
Independente da diferenзa entre gкneros, fatores sуcio-culturais, nacionalidade e abordagens de ensino, existem aspectos comuns no processo de desenho de memуria de crianзas entre 5 a 12 anos. 

Estudo do desenho de Memуria (ordem curta):
O estudo compara o processo de desenho de memуria de cinco grupos de crianзas distribuнdos em quatro escolas do bairro da vбrzea no Recife com os cinco grupos de crianзas francesas.
As sessхes de desenho sгo vнdeo monitorado nas respectivas salas de aulas. Dois pares de participantes sгo filmados numa mйdia de 20 minutos (10 minutos para cada par). O mesmo grupo de participantes й filmado durante todo o ano, porйm em cada sessгo uma combinaзгo de participantes e uma ordem diferente de desenho sгo randomicamente selecionadas. Os participantes sгo monitorizados em pares, pois a interaзгo e diбlogos entre os participantes fornecem e complementam dados sobre a atividade de desenho.

Anбlise:
Anбlise das comunalidades no processo de desenho de memуria (ordem curta) atravйs do estudo da freqькncia e da seqькncia de uso dos componentes grбficos e sua co-relaзгo com os aspectos semiуticos e cognitivos apontados por Darras (1996, 1998, 2004).

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Ensina Design 2: A introduзгo de conteъdos de Design da Informaзгo na formaзгo dos professores das Licenciaturas
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: Esta proposta aborda os aspectos que interligam o Design da Informaзгo e a Educaзгo. Especificamente, este projeto pretende de forma crнtica cercar a problemбtica do uso da linguagem grбfica (LG) em artefatos educacionais digitais por professores do ensino fundamental. Objetiva propor diretrizes e parвmetros de conteъdos e metodologias do Design da Informaзгo (DI) para o currнculo das Licenciaturas de Ensino Fundamental no Brasil. Para empreender esta proposiзгo cinco estudos serгo desenvolvidos: (1) Validaзгo da Metodologia Integrativa de Formaзгo do Canal Visual (MetaInFoVisual) de Lopes (2010), para professores das licenciaturas; (2) Aplicaзгo da MetaInFoVisual para a uso da lousa digital; (3) Aplicaзгo da MetaInFoVisual para a uso do computador/PowerPoint; (4) Aplicaзгo da MetaInFoVisual para a uso do tablet; (5) Construзгo da plataforma online Ensina Design/MetaInFoVisual. A coleta de dados se darб por meio dos seguintes procedimentos: (a) Mapeamento das atividades de uso da LG, em sala de aula, por formandos em licenciatura nos artefatos educacionais digitais; (b) Anбlise do processo de construзгo da LG por formandos por meio de experimentos didбticos utilizando a MetaInFoVisual, com formandos em Pedagogia e das Licenciaturas em Fнsica, Quнmica, Histуria, Geografia, Artes Visuais, Mъsica; (c) Anбlise do processo de geraзгo de informaзгo observando as comunalidades e diferenзas na construзгo das informaзхes grбfica, por meio da adaptaзгo da metodologia de Coutinho (1998); (d) Grupo Focal com professores, educadores e designers com o objetivo de identificar os conteъdos e metodologias de Design da Informaзгo ъteis а formaзгo de professores das licenciaturas; (e) Cursos presenciais com acompanhamento a distancia introduzindo os conteъdos de DI/LG aplicados a artefatos educacionais digitais para estudantes das licenciaturas citadas; (f) Anбlise do discurso (verbo/visual) dos nнveis de assimilaзгo/retenзгo e novas elaboraзхes dos conteъdos trabalhados nos cursos du

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: A partir de conhecimentos oriundos das бreas de Memуria Grбfica e Design/Educaзгo, articulados pelo viйs do Design da Informaзгo, a presente pesquisa visa gerar novos artefatos educacionais para o ensino fundamental e/ou mйdio tendo como referente os artefatos de memуria grбfica pernambucana. Para atingir tal meta pretende: (1) Identificar os argumentos do campo do Design/Educaзгo e da Informaзгo ъteis аqueles da Memуria Grбfica; (2) Estabelecer parвmetros para seleзгo de artefatos de MGP com potencial educativo; (3) Discutir as metodologias de design ъteis para geraзгo de artefatos de natureza educativa; (4) Desenvolver, em conjunto com professores, um artefato educacional tendo como argumento a MGP; (5) Validar o artefato no ambiente escolar com professores e estudantes; e, (6) Propor recomendaзхes para a geraзгo de artefatos dessa natureza. Й uma pesquisa composta por trкs processos, que constituem as fases metodolуgicas: (1) exploratуria; (2) aplicada e (3) experimental. Pretende, ao final minimizar as lacunas, assim como reduzir a distвncia entre o mundo interno e aquele externo а escola, articulando elementos da cultura material e imaterial local nesta ambiкncia. Espera-se tambйm contribuir com recomendaзхes para a geraзгo de artefatos educacionais que poderб ampliar a autonomia dos professores para a produзгo de material educativo.

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: Esta proposta encontra-se na convergкncia entre os campos do Design e da Educaзгo. Especificamente, este projeto pretende de forma reflexiva e contнnua atualizar a RIDE Rede Internacional de Design/Educaзгo compreendidos como campos teуricos de pertencimento intrнnsecos. Para a manutenзгo da RIDE, trabalharemos com a dimensгo das aзхes emancipatуrias do campo da Educaзгo e com os discursos, prбticas, aзхes e mйtodos advindos do campo do Design. Desta forma, a rede se mantenha alicerзada em dois fundamentos no campo do Design/Educaзгo, a saber: (1) a formaзгo [ou aзгo formadora], e (2) a produзгo dos dispositivos educacionais. Atrelado aos fundamentos, a rede й constituнda em quatro dimensхes : (a) discurso; (b) agentes; (c) agenciamentos; (d) ambiкncia.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Livros didбticos da primeira sйrie: uma proposta de projeto editorial
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO-INGLES: First-grade textbooks: a design proposal

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: 3o Congresso Internacional de Design da Informaзгo
DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: Anais do 3o Congresso Internacional de Design da Informaзгo
DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.NOME-DA-EDITORA: SBDI - Sociedade Brasileira de Design da Informaзгo

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Sendo o livro didбtico um valioso artefato informacional que contribui efetivamente na formaзгo do usuбrio, neste caso ? crianзas da 1Є Sйrie do Ensino Fundamental ?, verifica-se o emergente interesse em estudar os elementos estruturais da apresentaзгo grбfica para o conteъdo pedagуgico nele exposto. Neste sentido, o presente artigo propхe um projeto grбfico para uma coleзгo de livros didбticos de disciplinas da sйrie escolar acima mencionada. Como ponto de partida para a proposta grбfica, levamos em consideraзгo: a) os padrхes e recomendaзхes preestabelecidos para a eficбcia do uso da linguagem grбfica; e, b) a influкncia da linguagem grбfica virtual (hipertextos, links, boxes, menus, entre outros). Com a aplicaзгo do design ao conteъdo, percebeu-se que este ъltimo pode ser configurado visualmente dentro de uma dinвmica, respeitando os parвmetros adequados de legibilidade e promovendo uma identidade com a linguagem atualmente vivenciada pelo usuбrio nas mнdias digitais.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Since textbooks are a valuable source of information, effectively playing a vital role in the learning process of its user, in this case ? 1st Year Juniors in Primary School Education ?, it is of utmost importance to examine the structural elements of the graphical material presented within their pedagogic content. Thus, this article proposes a graphic project for a collection of textbooks for subjects dealt with in the above-mentioned educational level. In order to undertake such a graphic proposal the following points were taken into consideration: a) the pre-established standards and recommendations for the effective use of graphic language; and, b) the influence of virtual graphic language (hypertexts, links, boxes, menus, amongst others). By applying design to the contents, it was perceived that this second consideration could be visually configured dynamically, respecting the necessary parameters of legibility and, at the same time providing language, which is easily recognisable by the users due to their everyday contact with digital media.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Estudo trans-cultural do processo de desenho infantil de memуria de crianзas entre 5 a 12 anos da Franзa e do Brasil
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO-INGLES: A trans-cultural study of the process of drawing from memory on children from 5 to 12 years of age in France and Brazil

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: 3o Congresso Internacional de Design da Informaзгo | 2o InfoDesign Brasil
DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: Anais do 3o Congresso Internacional de Design da Informaзгo
DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.NOME-DA-EDITORA: SBDI - Sociedade Brasileira de Design da Informaзгo

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Este artigo apresenta um estudo trans-cultural comparativo que considera as diferenзas e similaridades no processo de desenho infantil de memуria de crianзas entre 5 e 12 anos da Franзa e do Brasil. O estudo, de carбter qualitativo, relata o processo de desenho observado no contexto francкs, e compara a presenзa de comunalidades no uso de componentes grбficos de cinco objetos (abacaxi, mбquina de escrever, bule, estrela do mar e telefone) atravйs de estudos da freqькncia e da seqькncia associados. A hipуtese й que independentemente da idade, gкnero, idioma, instruзхes das professoras, abordagem educacional e caracterнsticas dos objetos, existem comunalidades no processo de desenho de memуria dos diferentes contextos culturais considerados.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This paper presents a comparative trans-cultural study that considers the differences and similarities on the drawing process from memory of children from 5 to 12 years in France and Brazil. The study, of a qualitative nature, reports the drawing process observed within the French context, and compares the presence of commonalities of use of the graphic components of five objects (pineapple, typewriter, teapot, starfish and telephone) through the frequency and sequence studies associated. The study hypothesis is that regardless of age, gender, the language spoken, teacher?s instructions, educational approach and the characteristics of the object there are commonalities in the drawing process from memory.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Por uma estйtica aplicada ao Design
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO-INGLES: Towards a design applied aesthetics

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: 3o Congresso Internacional de Design da Informaзгo
DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: Anais do 3o Congresso Internacional de Design da Informaзгo
DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.NOME-DA-EDITORA: SBDI - Sociedade Brasileira de Design da Informaзгo

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Neste artigo, tratamos da estйtica enquanto uma бrea do conhecimento importante para o design, tanto do ponto de vista teуrico quanto prбtico. Adotamos, contudo, prioritariamente o enfoque teуrico. Discutimos aqui a funзгo da estйtica no design, confrontando os conceitos de arte, beleza e comunicaзгo. Buscamos com esta discussгo obter uma definiзгo e uma estrutura teуrica que possam nortear o desenvolvimento de conhecimento sobre uma estйtica aplicada ao design.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: In this paper aesthetics is treated as an important area of knowledge for design, from a theoretical as well as a practical viewpoint. However, for the purposes of this paper, priority has been given to the theoretical approach. The function of aesthetics in design is discussed, focussing on the concepts of art, beauty and communication. This discussion has been addressed in order to obtain both a definition and a theoretical structure that will act as a guide for the development of knowledge within design applied aesthetics.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Este artigo discute o desenvolvimento de bulas de medicamento eficazes do ponto de vista informacional. A participaзгo dos usuбrios no processo de design й ressaltada como uma forma de prever os possнveis lapsos da informaзгo que podem acontecer no momento da leitura da bula. Esta, apуs as testagens e refinamentos, deve ser finalmente caracterizada como um material de apoio confiбvel para o uso correto e seguro de medicamentos pelo paciente. Apуs uma breve descriзгo do panorama enfrentado no paнs pelos designers da informaзгo na бrea da saъde, veremos alguns caminhos possнveis para o design participativo das bulas de medicamento. Serгo apresentados trкs critйrios de avaliaзгo do material instrucional ? leiturabilidade, usabilidade e aceitabilidade ? e suas implicaзхes para o design final do documento. Finalmente, apresentarei algumas conclusхes e recomendaзхes sobre esse assunto, visando a melhoria das bulas de medicamento produzidas para pacientes no Brasil.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This paper discusses the development of efficient medicine package inserts from the informational point of view. The user involvement in the design process is reaffirmed as a way to predict possible lapses of information that can happen in the moment of reading the insert. This one, after testing and refining, must be finally characterized as a trustful support material to the correct and safe medicine taking by patient. After a brief description of the scenario faced in the country by the information designers in the health area, we will see some possible ways for the participatory design of medicine package inserts. It will be presented three criteria for the assessment of the instructional material ? readability, usability and likeability ? and their implications to the final design of the document. At last, I will present some conclusions and recommendations about this issue, aiming improvements for the patient package inserts produced in Brazil.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Pesquisas sobre design brasileiro emergem com propуsito de investigar suas origens, desenvolvimento e caracterнsticas. O estudo do passado dos artefatos se relaciona com a cultura porque reflete os costumes de um determinado tempo e a construзгo de significados compartilhados pelos homens. Modelos de anбlise grбfica com fundamentos semiуticos sгo adequados a este fim, pois se propхe a investigaзгo de sentidos atribuнdos no seu princнpio ontolуgico. O presente artigo, baseado nas propostas para anбlise de Martine Joly (1996), Donis A. Dondis (1997), Lъcia Santaella (2005), e no modelo de catalogaзгo do programa Donato, do Sistema de Informaзхes do Acervo do Museu Nacional de Belas Artes (SIMBA), tem como objetivo propor um modelo para catalogaзгo e anбlise para pesquisas sobre artefatos histуricos.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The main aim of research into Brazilian design is to investigate its origins, development and characteristics. The study of objects from the past is related to culture, since it reflects the customs of a determined time and the construction of a set of meanings shared amongst human beings. Models of graphic analysis with a semiotic focus are suitable for these ends, since they propose the investigation of attributed meanings within its ontological principles. The objective of this paper, based on the analytical proposals by Martine Joly (1996), Donis A. Dondis (1997), Lъcia Santaella (2005), and in the cataloguing model from the Donato programme, in the Sistema de Informaзхes do Acervo do Museu Nacional de Belas Artes (SIMBA), is to propose a model for cataloguing and analysis for research on historical articles.

A pesquisa aqui resumida propхe seu campo de discussгo nas fronteiras limнtrofes entre as disciplinas do Design, mais propriamente do Design Grбfico e da Educaзгo. Esta abordagem estб vinculada ao universo de pesquisa do Projeto Ensina Design: a introduзгo de conteъdos de Design Grбfico no ensino fundamental Brasileiro, coordenado pela professora Solange Coutinho do Departamento de Design da Universidade Federal de Pernambuco (UFPE), Brasil.

Considerando os diversos atores (os alunos, os professores e os gestores da polнtica educacional) e os objetos mediadores do aprendizado desse processo (os artefatos educacionais). 

Entretanto, o nosso recorte serб dado na atuaзгo do professor (das licenciaturas), e faz o entendimento deste papel de forma que englobe as metodologias de design, ou seja, como gerador de informaзгo visual.

Nos propomos a evidenciar a abrangкncia da problemбtica da linguagem visual e discutir a hipуtese de que a inserзгo intencional de conteъdos de Design Grбfico, mais precisamente os advindos do campo da linguagem grбfica (verbal, pictуrica e esquemбtica), na formaзгo de docentes contribuirб para o desenvolvimento do corpo teуrico que atua na busca de ferramentas para a superaзгo desse problema. 

Vamos nos confrontar tambйm com o entendimento de que pensar na introduзгo de conteъdos provenientes do design grбfico, na formaзгo do professor pode ser estudado atravйs do viйs da interdisciplinaridade. Nesta perspectiva, tomamos como pressuposto o entendimento da professora Rita Couto (PUC-RJ), de que o design brasileiro fez e faz a construзгo do seu corpo teуrico em virtude da adoзгo da aзгo interdisciplinar como uma prбtica para se atualizar, delimitar, alargar, ou confrontar seus conceitos. E assim estabelecer a interpolaзгo de saberes quando o nosso objetivo final й

Independente de onde seja o seu comeзo, na caverna de Lascaux, nos afrescos em baixo relevo do Egito, na Grйcia, na coluna de Trajano romana, na idade mйdia com as ilustraзхes em miniatura, na tapeзaria de Bayeux, nos quadros de Willian Hogarth, de James Gillray, ou nos бlbuns de Rodolphe Tцpffer, a histуria em quadrinhos (banda desenhada) atraн desde muito o interesse de leitores, ?fгs?, amadores e pesquisadores. 

Banda desenhada (Portugal), histуria em quadrinhos (Brasil), cartoon ou comic (UK, EUA e Alemanha), fumetto (Itбlia), Tebeo ou historietas (Espanha), Mangб (Japгo), Manhua ou Lianhuanhua (China), Manhwa (Corйia), nгo importa a apelaзгo. De tintin а Titeuf, de Becassine а Betty boop, do Superman ao Chat du rabin, a histуria em quadrinhos entra na vida de todos, traz o seu universo, nos transporta, algumas vezes atravйs da sua magia e, outras atravйs das viagens em busca dos festivais, Angoulкme, Saint-malo, Amiens, Bruxelas, Cannes, entre os mais conhecidos. 

Tкm astroboy, pokemon, dora, dragon ball Z, Babar, marsupilani, cavaleiros do zodнaco, nana, set up love history, lady snow blood, quartier loitain, le jeu des hirondelles, Largo Winch, Bang Bang, histуria em quadrinhos para crianзas, histуria em quadrinhos para adultos. Ficзгo, realidade, fatos histуricos, adaptaзхes da literatura, biografias. Um pouco de tudo na histуria em quadrinhos (banda desenhada). Para todas as idades, todos os gostos, e gкneros. 

No entanto, pouco se pode observar sobre os efeitos pedagуgicos da histуria em quadrinho e sobre a utilizaзгo da estуria em quadrinho como ferramenta educacional. Pesquisas conduzidas com este fim nгo sгo muitas, sendo assim, o objetivo principal deste artigo й o de apontar as inъmeras possibilidades de utilizaзгo da estуria em quadrinhos, levando em consideraзгo a leitura e a produзгo, como ferramenta pedagуgica tanto para a cultura visual (educaзгo artнstica, arte/educaзгo) quanto para outras disciplinas.

AUTORES.NOME-COMPLETO-DO-AUTOR: PAULA VIANA DE REZENDE E VALADARES
AUTORES.NOME-PARA-CITACAO: VALADARES, Paula Viana de Rezende e

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: O Frevo й a manifestaзгo cultural mais explorada como sнmbolo de identidade pernambucana. Com mais de cem anos de batismo esta manifestaзгo cultural й hoje reconhecida, vivida e explorada pelo povo, elite, indъstria, meios de comunicaзгo e Estado. A sua expressгo visual й forte para o pernambucano, sendo a sombrinha o seu maior sнmbolo. Mas como se construiu este нcone? Dentro do processo de transformaзгo do Frevo ao longo do tempo й possнvel identificar quatro fases nas quais se desenvolvem os suportes para sua expressгo visual: 1) da origem; 2) da divulgaзгo em produtos da indъstria cultural; 3) do processo de espetacularizaзгo e, 4) a fase final na qual o Frevo й convertido como o sнmbolo maior da cultura pernambucana. Este artigo objetiva tratar da expressгo visual que representou o frevo ao longo dos ъltimos cem anos.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Frevo is the cultural aspect most explored as the symbolic identity of the state of Pernambucano. Born more than one hundred years ago, this cultural expression is recognized, experienced and explored by the people, the elite, industry, communication media and the state itself. Its visual representation has become a strong icon for Pernambucano, of which the umbrella is most significant symbol. But how has it become such an icon? During its transformation process over the last century, it is possible to identify four developmental stages from which the frevo found support for its visual expression:1) its origins; 2) its dissemination throughout the cultural industry; 3) its process of turning into a show and, 4)the final stage, in which Frevo is converted into the most well-known symbol of the culture of Pernambuco. This paper aims to present the visual expression of frevo over the past one hundred years.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
This article presents arguments extracted from a research study entitled: Graphic language in Brazilian education: a study concerning its inclusion in teacher training courses. This research has proved that the introduction of graphic design content contributes to creating a structure of theoretical and practical argumentation, which in turn, favours the legitimate teaching of graphic design within the classroom. 
This article emphasizes a theoretical perspective originating from the fusion of two contents: design and education; and proposes a discussion on the understanding of multiple literacy processes, from which the comprehension of knowledge is linked to what contemporary languages elicit, notably related to those from ?visual literacy?.
Moreover, the debate explores the comprehension that, within a contemporary spirit, a perspective is opened that broadens the relationship between design and modern society from its discussion as a social phenomenon. Thus, design is also understood as an integrative subject of learning needs for non-specialists? in this case, Brazilian teachers ? based on information design theories, more precisely through the contents of Graphic Language (GL).

The proposal of this article is to encourage further research, along theoretical lines of thought and methodology, which reinforce the discussion regarding design as a subject that may aid the teaching/learning relationship, bearing in mind that in the reality of contemporary knowledge, it is not only designers who generate visual information.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This article sets out to present a discussion regarding the behaviour of educational institutions, within an analysis of the methodological considerations, consequences and practice of inserting design, more precisely Graphic Language, into teacher training programmes. It presents some arguments about Brazilian education in terms of image and design through the point of view of art education, as a real support within this context, reflecting on the positive aspects of the content reality and methodology applied to the school structure.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: O livro й um exemplo significativo de como captar informaзхes sobre sociedade a qual pertence. Devido a este carбter incomum, o livro torna-se um artefato importante para estudos em diversas бreas do conhecimento, inclusive a do Design. Atravйs de um olhar direcionado а estrutura visual, este trabalho busca entender as evoluзхes tecnolуgicas e conceituais que guiaram os projetos grбficos em diferentes йpocas da educaзгo brasileira. Para tal, sгo estudados, especificamente, os livros didбticos impressos no Estado de Pernambuco desde meados do sйculo XIX atй a dйcada de 1990. Por meio desta pesquisa foram fixados padrхes que caracterizam a produзгo grбfica local e apresentada uma representaзгo da linha evolutiva das soluзхes encontradas pelos projetistas na forma de como dispor as informaзхes no impresso. Por fim, este estudo se apresenta como um registro da memуria visual do Estado e seu desenvolvimento grбfico no campo educacional.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: A book is one strong example of how to capture information about the society to which one belongs. Therefore, because of this unusual character, a book becomes an important artifact for studying a number of areas of knowledge, including Design. From the viewpoint of visual structure, this study attempts to understand the technological and conceptual evolution that has guided graphic projects at different historical moments of Brazilian education. Thus, this study will specifically examine textbooks printed in the state of Pernambuco since the mid-nineteenth century until the 1990s. The study has established certain standards in order to characterize the local graphic production and presents a graphical representation of the evolutionary line of solutions adopted by designers in their attempt to provide information in the printed material. Finally, the study stands as a record of visual memory for the state and its graphical development in the field of education.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO-INGLES: Parallel visual culture: the design of children?s textbooks

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: O conteъdo deste artigo baseia-se no estudo das relaзхes existentes entre atividades pautadas nos conhecimentos de Design e o cotidiano do ser humano enquanto sujeito manipulador de informaзгo. Destaca-se o conceito de interatividade entre as бreas do conhecimento que fundamentam a postura pedagуgica desta pesquisa, que busca promover uma relaзгo de reciprocidade entre o Design e a Educaзгo para a construзгo de soluзхes metodolуgicas para o benefнcio social. O objetivo й estimular o desenvolvimento das capacidades visuais das crianзas em funзгo dos materiais jб disponнveis em seu cotidiano escolar. De вmbito regional o estudo analisa a estrutura de Livros Infantis Para-didбticos disponнveis no mercado pernambucano sob um olhar estйtico-estruturalista-funcionalista, calcado nos preceitos da Linguagem Visual. Aliando correntes de pensamentos relacionadas ao campo do Design esta pesquisa observa as caracterнsticas grбficas que compхem a estrutura organizacional desses livros e busca identificar os elementos constituintes da mensagem visual que й apresentada аs crianзas.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The content of this article is based on a study of the existent relationships between the activities featured within the area of design and of the day-to-day life of human beings in their handling of information. The article also highlights the concept of interactivity between the areas of human knowledge that have been the basis for the pedagogic posture adopted by this study, and which seeks to promote a reciprocal relationship between Design and Education in order to construct methodical solutions for the benefit of society. The aim is to stimulate the development of children?s visual capacities with regard to the material available to them at school. On a more regional level, the study also analyses the structure of children?s textbooks distributed in the north-eastern Brazilian state of Pernambuco, from an aesthetic-structural-functional viewpoint, as set down by the precepts of Visual Language. By bringing together currents of thought related to the area of Design, this study observes the graphic characteristics that compose the organisational structure of these textbooks and attempts to identify the components of the visual message being presented to children.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO-INGLES: Towards a typographical classification for popular letterings

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: A diversidade da paisagem tipogrбfica dos centros urbanos nos proporciona uma sйrie de experiкncias visuais e informacionais. Nesse universo, encontramos o trabalho manual dos letristas populares, que resiste ao tempo, apesar das intensas inovaзхes tecnolуgicas na бrea da comunicaзгo visual e torna-se um valioso objeto de estudo como forma de expressгo da cultura material de um povo e parte constituinte da histуria do design brasileiro informal. Desta forma, este artigo procura registrar a diversidade do trabalho dos letristas populares, assim como investigar as influкncias estйticas dos mesmos, a fim de compreender melhor o imaginбrio popular aproximando-o da prбtica profissional do design. Para isso, apresentamos o processo de construзгo de uma classificaзгo tipolуgica para os letreiramentos populares, que procurou sistematizar a produзгo destes artefatos de acordo com trкs aspectos: autoria, forma de representaзгo visual da linguagem verbal e atributos formais. Como resultado, apresentamos seis categorias iniciais de letreiramentos oriundos da anбlise e observaзгo de 50 artefatos.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The diversity of the urban typographical environment provokes a series of visual and informational experiences. Within this universe, we encounter the hand-written signs with popular lettering, which, despite the innumerable technological innovations in the area of visual communication, manage to stand the test of time. Such artifacts are valuable sources of information of the cultural expression a particular social group and have become a constitutive part of the history of Brazilian informal graphic design. This article seeks to register the diversity of work created by these popular lettering sign writers, as well as to investigate their aesthetic influences, so as to understand popular imaginary more fully, and thus bring it towards the professional practice of design. We therefore, present the process of creating a classification for popular lettering typology, with the intention of systematizing the production of these artifacts in accordance to the following aspects: authorship, the forms of visually representing verbal language and formal attributes. As a result, eight categories of popular lettering are herein presented, which have been identified and established through the observation of fifty artifacts.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO-INGLES: Logos on XX century magazines of Pernambuco: a study about intrinsic and extrinsic aspects of the verbal graphic language

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: O presente artigo apresenta o resultado da anбlise grбfica da evoluзгo dos logotipos nas capas de periуdicos pernambucanos, mais especificamente das revistas A Pilheria, Revista da Cidade e Vitrina, que circularam na cidade de Recife entre as dйcadas de 20, 30 e 40. O estudo se inicia com uma pesquisa de campo no acervo da Fundaзгo Joaquim Nabuco, aliada ao levantamento bibliogrбfico sobre o tema. Em seguida foi construнdo um instrumento de anбlise capaz de descrever os aspectos intrнnsecos e extrнnsecos da composiзгo tipogrбfica dos logotipos de cada revista, assim como observar os elementos verbais, pictуricos e esquemбticos que interagem com os mesmos, alйm de registrar informaзхes gerais para catalogaзгo de cada exemplar. Por fim, a partir do universo analisado, foi traзado um perfil das principais caracterнsticas visuais dos logotipos presentes nas capas de revistas pernambucanas da primeira metade do sйculo XX, que apontou para uma tendкncia ao uso cambiante de logotipos, mesmo que de forma aparentemente nгo planejada no ato da concepзгo da linha editorial.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This article presents the result of a graphic analysis of the evolution of logos presents at the covers of some Pernambuco?s magazines, specially A Pilheria, Revista da Cidade and Vitrina. These magazines circulated in Recife (Pernambuco capital) during the decades of 20, 30 and 40 of the XX century. The study initiates with a field research within the Joaquim Nabuco Foundation archives along with a bibliographic review on the subject. Next, an analytical device of analysis was set in order to describe the intrinsic and extrinsic aspects of typographical composition within the logotypes in each magazine and to observe the verbal, pictorial and schematic elements that interact with it, allied to that general information about the artefacts were register and catalogued. Finally it describes the main visual characteristics of the logos that figures at Pernambuco?s magazines in the first half of XX century, although apparently not planned in the act of designing each magazine, it is possible to observe a constant variation in its visual configuration.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Design e as polнticas pъblicas: um panorama nacional para a inserзгo do design na educaзгo brasileira.
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO-INGLES: Design and the public politics: a national panorama towards the inclusion of Design within Brazilian education system.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: O conteъdo deste artigo consiste no mapeamento dos programas do governo brasileiro, relativos а educaзгo, especificamente aqueles que se destinam a atuaзгo e formaзгo de professores. A base para nossa discussгo sгo os programas alinhados ao Plano de Desenvolvimento da Educaзгo ? PDE, e cujo foco concentra na preocupaзгo com o papel do professor dentro e fora da sala de aula. Identificamos que nestes programas, as suas aзхes articuladas formam um panorama, do ponto de vista das polнticas pъblicas, que favorece a inserзгo do design na escola brasileira, o que permite aзхes concretas situadas na zona hнbrida entre os conteъdos de design e de educaзгo.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This article examines the educational programmes brought in by the Brazilian Government, specifically those that deal with both the tasks performed by teachers and their training. The discussion herein is based on government programmes linked to the Plan for Developing Education ? PDE, and focuses specifically on matters related to the role of the teacher both inside and outside the classroom. From a public policy viewpoint, this work identifies that the actions highlighted within these programmes form a panorama, which favours the inclusion of design in Brazilian schools, and that allows for a set of specific ?hybrid? actions to be inserted within the contents of design and education.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO-INGLES: An analysis of Game Design Document: Interpretation and Results.

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-2: Atividades dos serviзos de tecnologia da informaзгo

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: O documento de game design й o principal artefato utilizado pela indъstria de jogos digitais para a comunicaзгo entre a equipe de concepзгo e a equipe de produзгo. Nesse trabalho, testamos a eficiкncia desse artefato, analisando a partir de um experimento com sujeitos da indъstria de jogos digitais o quгo claras sгo as informaзхes de um documento de game design. Os resultados apontam que, na verdade, a informaзгo dos documentos costuma ser interpretada de forma insatisfatуria lavando a uma sйrie de distorзхes informacionais que decorrem em produtos inconsistentes com o projeto ou demandam um envolvimento permanente da equipe de concepзгo durante a fase de produзгo.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The game design document is the main artefact used in the game industry for digital games as a channel of communication between the conception team and the production team. In this paper, we test the efficiency of this artefact, analyzing through an experiment with subjects from the digital game industry how clear the information of a game design document is. The results show that, actually, the information of the document is commonly interpreted in an unsatisfactory way, leading to a series of informational distortions that occur in inconsistent products for their project or demand a permanent involvement with the conception team during the production phase.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: From the streets to the screen: street signs as a source of inspiration for digital typefaces
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO-INGLES: From the streets to the screen: street signs as a source of inspiration for digital typefaces

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-1: Atividades ligadas ao patrimфnio cultural e ambiental

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
Street signs are valuable pieces of material culture, having an important role in the constitution of the urban landscape, and of the graphic memory associated within this environment. In the context of visual communication, typography and lettering, hand painted street signs might be described as ?vernacular? artefacts, that is, as products of design practices that evolved before, or in spite of, the institution of modern design schools, mostly by anonymous commercial artists. Printed ephemera, like street posters, are also typical examples of this, and the lettering found in such artefacts has been a source of inspiration for many digital type designers. 

The interest in design inspired by vernacular sources might be traced back to studies conducted in the 1960s and 1970s in the field of architecture, and, more recently, in the practice of experimental type design in the 1980s and 1990s. However, while in the US or in Europe, this trend may be interpreted as a challenge or a rebellion against the status quo of a typographical tradition, in countries where type design flourished as a result of the popularization of digital technologies, like Brazil, Argentina, Chile and Mexico, it acquires a special meaning, once it is contemporary to the birth of such tradition. 

This paper presents an analysis of digital typefaces inspired by street signs, aiming to reveal its motivations and design strategies. This analysis is based on a framework that takes into account three perspectives: a) the formal attributes of the typefaces, b) the identity and degree of expertise of the original designer and, c) the cultural and site specificity of the original artefact.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Esquemas grбficos para informar: a linguagem grбfica esquemбtica na produзгo e utilizaзгo de livros didбticos infantis na cidade do Recife.
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO-INGLES: Graphical schemes to inform: Schematic Graphic Language on the production and use of textbooks for children in Recife

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
Esquemas grбficos do cotidiano representam uma poderosa ferramenta que pode ser
incorporada а cultura visual da escola por meio dos artefatos educacionais. Este artigo
apresenta um estudo sobre o uso da Linguagem Grбfica Esquemбtica (LGE) em livros
didбticos infantis, apresentando trкs pesquisas subsequentes, que objetivam: 1) identificar
esquemas, disciplinas e ano de escolaridade mais representativos; 2) analisar
comparativamente esquemas mais e menos eficazes; e 3) verificar o grau de familiaridade dos
profissionais originadores e consumidores desses artefatos com a LGE. Os resultados
apontam timidez no uso de esquemas nesses artefatos e necessidade de maior integraзгo entre professor, autor e designer.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
Schemes of the daily charts are a powerful tool that can be incorporated into the visual
culture of the school by means of educational artifacts. This article presents a study on the
use of Schematic Graphic Language (SGL) in books for children, with three subsequent
research, which aim to: 1) identify schemes, disciplines and years of schooling more
representative, 2) comparative analysis schemes more effective and less and 3) determine the
degree of familiarity of professional originators and consumers of these artifacts with SGL.
The results show timidity in the use of schemes such artifacts and the need for greater
integration between teacher, author and designer.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO-INGLES: The design and the elementary school teacher: a brief discussion concerning Brazilian law and its articulation towards design contents

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: 9є Congresso Brasileiro de Pesquisa e Desenvolvimento em Design - P&D DESIGN 2010
DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: Anais do 9є Congresso Brasileiro de Pesquisa e Desenvolvimento em Design - P&D DESIGN 2010

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Este artigo apresenta uma anбlise sucinta da Lei de Diretriz de Base Educacional - LDBEN e das Diretrizes Curriculares Nacionais para a Formaзгo de Professores. Tais legislaзхes sгo fundamentais para compreender o panorama legal atual do ensino brasileiro, que em contato com a epistemologia de design produz uma condiзгo favorбvel а introduзгo de conteъdos do campo do design, em particular da linguagem grбfica, para nгo-especialistas, nesse caso, os professores das licenciaturas.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This paper presents a short analysis of the LDBEN (Brazilian Education Law) and the National Curriculum Guidelines for the school teachers? learning. Those legislations are fundamental tools in order to understand the present legal panorama of Brazilian education that linked with the Design epistemology produce a favorable condition towards the introduction of design contents, in particular the graphic language for non-specialists, in this case, the school teachers.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
Este artigo apresenta o processo de construзгo de padrхes tipogrбficos para os letreiramentos
populares que foi consolidado ao final do projeto de pesquisa intitulado ?Panorama
Tipogrбfico dos Letreiramentos Populares ? um estudo de caso na cidade do Recife?,
desenvolvido durante o Mestrado em Design do Programa de Pуs-graduaзгo da UFPE e parte
integrante do Projeto de Pesquisa Memуria Grбfica Brasileira. Para a construзгo da
classificaзгo tipolуgica para os letreiramentos populares foram considerados trкs aspectos:
autoria, forma de representaзгo visual da linguagem verbal e atributos formais.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
This paper presents the process of construction of a typographical model for the popular
letterings, consolidated by the end of the research project entitled "Typographical Panorama
of Popular Letterings - a case study in Recife," conducted during the Master Design Course
at the UFPE Postgraduate Program and a related part of the investigation: Brazilian
Graphic Memory Project. For the construction of typological classification for the popular
lettering were considered three aspects: authorship, visual form of representing verbal
language and formal attributes.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: O presente artigo apresenta um panorama da pesquisa em desenvolvimento intitulada Anбlise da linguagem grбfica em construзгo: o uso do ?quadro? nas aulas expositivas no ensino fundamental brasileiro, vinculado ao projeto Ensina Design. Os resultados aqui apresentados foram obtidos atravйs da observaзгo do uso do quadro em aulas de turmas do terceiro ano do Ensino Fundamental de duas escolas do Recife, alйm de entrevista com as professoras.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This article presents an overview of a current research entitled ?An analysis of graphic language under construction: the use of the 'board' within the classroom in Brazilian elementary schools?, linked to the project ?Teach Design?. The results shown here were obtained by observing the use of the board in third year classrooms at two elementary schools in Recife, allied to interviews with the teachers.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Consideraзхes preliminares sobre a arte/educaзгo e a sua relaзгo com o design na formaзгo do professor das licenciaturas.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
Este artigo apresenta uma breve discussгo acerca de possibilidades que o campo da
Arte/Educaзгo permite, enquanto universo epistemolуgico e metodolуgico, para
aproximarmos os conteъdos de Design, mais precisamente da Linguagem Grбfica, dos
professores das licenciaturas, como uma disciplina de carбter formador. Apresentamos
algumas ponderaзхes relativas ao universo do ensino, alйm de resumida anбlise da
abordagem triangular como uma proposta metodolуgica cabнvel ao contexto.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
This paper presents a brief discussion concerning the possibilities brought about by the field
of Art/Education, in terms of the epistemological and methodological universes, in order to
approach the contents of Design, more precisely the Graphic Language, of school teachers,
as a discipline within the training period. Certain considerations are presented related to the
universe of teaching, as well as a summarized analysis of the triangular approach as a
suitable methodological proposal for this context.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Este artigo aborda a trajetуria do projeto de pesquisa Ensina Design da UFPE, apresentando os seus principais argumentos ao longo de cinco anos de estudo. O referido projeto visa discutir a construзгo epistemolуgica do olhar do design da informaзгo sobre o uso da linguagem grбfica no ensino fundamental brasileiro. As metodologias adotadas pelo corpo de pesquisadores sгo descritas, assim como os resultados jб obtidos e os prognуsticos para pesquisas futuras.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This article discusses the trajectory of the research project Ensina Design (Teach Design) at the UFPE, presenting its main arguments over its five years of study. This project aims to discuss epistemological construction from the viewpoint of information design regarding the use of graphic language in the Brazilian Basic education system. The methodologies adopted by the researchers are described, as well as the results obtained and the prognosis for future research.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: As paisagens tipogrбficas urbanas de cada regiгo podem revelar um pouco dos hбbitos e costumes de seu povo, bem como elementos de sua cultura visual. Este artigo procura investigar a linguagem grбfica verbal, pictуrica e esquemбtica utilizadas pelos pintores letristas profissionais nos letreiramentos populares de Pernambuco e busca identificar a existкncia de padrхes ou convenзхes visuais peculiares a este universo. A metodologia de pesquisa adotada considerou duas etapas principais: a primeira consistiu em um estudo comparativo entre pesquisas de outros autores que observaram anteriormente estes artefatos em territуrios diversos; a segunda buscou ampliar e detalhar os resultados da fase inicial atravйs de uma pesquisa de campo para estudo de caso especнfico na cidade do Recife.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Urban typographic landscapes of each region may reveal some of the habits and customs of its people, as well as elements of their visual culture. This article seeks to investigate the verbal, pictorial and schematic graphic language used by professional painters in popular forms of lettering in the state of Pernambuco, and also attempts to identify the existence of patterns or visual conventions common to this particular universe. The research methodology considered two main steps: the first consisted of a comparative study between the research of other authors that observed previously these artifacts in different territories, the latter aimed to expand and detail the results of the previous stage through a field research to develop a case study in the city of Recife.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Este artigo contйm a descriзгo de uma investigaзгo sobre as mensagens grбficas realizadas por professores do ensino fundamental sobre a lousa ? a chamada Linguagem Grбfica Efкmera (LGEf) ?, sua metodologia, amostras, parвmetros de anбlises e resultados. Num segundo tуpico, como desdobramento desta e de outras pesquisas integrantes do projeto Ensina Design, foi realizada uma discussгo sobre a importвncia da inserзгo de conteъdos de Design na formaзгo de professores.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This article contains the description of an investigation about the graphic messages created by Brazilian basic education system?s teachers over the chalkboard ? which was nominated ephemeral graphic language ?, its methodology, its samples, the analysis patterns and its results. In a second matter, as an outspread of this and of the other researches that are part of the Teach Design Project, a discussion about the importance of the inception of design knowledge on the teachers? formation.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
Este artigo apresenta a metodologia desenvolvida durante um semestre pelo grupo de estudo
da Graduaзгo em Design da Universidade Federal de Pernambuco, intitulado ?Memуria
Grбfica Pernambucana: manifestaзхes vernaculares?. O objetivo principal do grupo foi a
investigaзгo e discussгo acerca das paisagens visuais das ruas, bairros e cidades, com кnfase na tipografia vernacular. Com base numa pesquisa de campo, os alunos desenvolveram, em grupo, um projeto tipogrбfico inspirado nos artefatos registrados e um artigo relatando as principais impressхes de cada objeto estudado.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
This paper introduces the methodology developed over a semester, by a study group on the
under-graduate design course, at the Universidade Federal de Pernambuco, entitled ?The
Graphic Memory of Pernambuco: a study focused on vernacular design?. The main objective
of the group was to investigate and discuss the visual environment of the cities and districts
where the students live, paying particular attention to vernacular typography and sign
lettering on the streets. Based on the field research, the students developed a font project and
also a report concerning the main impressions related to each specific artefact studied.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: O caso das receitas ilustradas: aplicaзгo de um modelo analнtico e as possibilidades de representaзгo de movimento em ilustraзхes estбticas

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
Este artigo apresenta uma breve discussгo no campo do design da informaзгo, com foco no
design instrucional e educaзгo. Investiga a representaзгo de procedimentos culinбrios e de
movimento no livro The Silver Spoon for Children a partir do modelo de Sequкncias
Pictуricas de Procedimentos (SPPs) de Spinillo (2000) e dos apontamentos de Souza (2008)
sobre a representaзгo de movimento em materiais estбticos. A partir da anбlise, consideraзхes
sгo feitas em relaзгo a: (a) organizaзгo, (b) elementos simbуlicos, (c) elementos de кnfase,
(d) estilo, (e) guias de leitura, (f) composiзгo; determinaзхes para uma produзгo consistente.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
This article presents a brief discussion in the area of information design, encircling
instructional design and the field of education. It investigates the pictorial sequences of
culinary procedures and how to represent movement in illustrated recipes from the book - The
Silver Spoon for Children. It uses the analytical model of procedural pictorial sequences
(PPSs) by Spinillo (2000), and Souza?s (2008) pointers concerning the representation of
movement within static instructional materials. From the analysis some considerations are
presented: (a) organization, (b) symbolic elements, (c) emphasis elements, (d) style, (e)
reading guides, (f) composition; determinations for a solid production.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Design da informaзгo e design instrucional: aproximaзхes e distanciamentos

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Neste artigo, os conceitos e as metodologias de trabalho e pesquisa do design da informaзгo e do design instrucional sгo revisitados e comparados em busca de estabelecer aproximaзхes e distanciamentos entre as duas бreas de conhecimento. Para atingir tal objetivo, foi realizada uma pesquisa bibliogrбfica, e os resultados apontam para algumas aproximaзхes e complementaridade entre esses campos.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: In this article, the concepts and the practical and scientific methodologies of information design and instructional design are revisited and compared in order to establish proximity and detachments between the two areas of knowledge. In order to achieve this aim, a bibliographical research has been conducted, and the results point out some proximities and complementarities within these fields.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Este artigo objetiva discutir a pesquisa no campo da memуria grбfica sob a уtica do design da informaзгo. Primeiramente sгo apresentadas especulaзхes acerca das possнveis motivaзхes que dirigem o designer da informaзгo a investigar a memуria grбfica. Em seguida, por meio da anбlise de publicaзхes da бrea й proposto um processo de pesquisa, adaptado aos artefatos de memуria grбfica, baseado naquele exposto por Pettersson (2006).
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This paper aims to discuss research in the field of graphic memory from the perspective of information design. Firstly, speculations are presented concerning the possible motivations that encourage information designers to investigate graphic memory. Following this, through analysis of publications within the area, a research process is presented, which has been adapted to the artefacts of graphic memory, based on the one presented by Pettersson (2006).

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Este artigo tem por objetivo discutir a relevвncia do estudo dos rуtulos de cachaзa para o resgate da memуria grбfica brasileira. Primeiramente discute-se a importвnica do estudo da memуria grбfica na possнvel construзгo da identidade brasileira, contribuindo para o debate no campo do design e, consequentemente, da cultura. A partir desta contextualizaзгo aborda-se o tema da cachaзa e a sua histуria, assim como observa-se as caracterнsticas dos rуtulos de cachaзa presentes em acervos histуricos, numa discussгo alusiva ao que permeia o imaginбrio e repertуrio brasileiro.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This paper aims to discuss the relevance of studying cachaзa labels as a form of restoring Brazilian graphic memory. Firstly, it discusses the importance of studies in graphic memory as a possible manner in which to construct Brazilian identity, contributing to the debate in the field of design and consequently, of culture. Through this context it approaches the theme of cachaзa and its history, as well as observing the characteristics of cachaзa labels present in historical archives, in an allusive discussion that permeates imagery and Brazilian repertoire.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This article aims to demonstrate the manner in which the information system of cachaзa labels has evolved from the early twentieth century to the present day. Changes are analyzed with samples of labels from three Brazilian states (Pernambuco, Rio de Janeiro and Sгo Paulo) and were acquired from the Almirante Collection at theJoaquim Nabuco Foundation (Recife-PE), the National Library Foundation (Rio de Janeiro) and Guaianases Collection (ICP-UFPE). The main criterion of the analysis was the Brazilian legislation for labeling. Changes are analyzed through a timeline with the key rulings and laws that regulated labeling cachaзa. The key moments are illustrated by examples of cachaзa labels, which are also analyzed from the viewpoint of composition.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Prevention of STD/AIDS: design and the communication process in printed media
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO-INGLES: Prevention of STD/AIDS: design and the communication process in printed media

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: 6th Information Design International Conference
DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: Proceedings of the 6th Information Design International Conference

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The aim of this study is to describe whether the manner in which receivers interpret messages in the communicative process in printed materials, with the theme of STD/AIDS, encourages behavior that promotes a healthier outlook and/or the acquisition of knowledge regarding prevention. For this, we have sought to: a) identify deficiencies in the development of such materials, b) identify relevant aspects inherent to the content of information, and c) describe the effectiveness of the modes of symbolization of the graphic language in the messages, from the perspective of the receiver. In order to examine the activity of developing materials, Activity Theory was employed, adapted to the Activity System of the sources of information. Two variables related to the communication process were addressed: the 'intentionality' and the 'effects' of messages. Thus, Focus Groups were used as a method for interaction with receptors by means of an instrument that concentrated on aspects related to printed materials. In general terms, and with certain exceptions, the variables for understanding the operationalization of the relationship between the elements of the Graphic Language in the planning and development of the printed materials were used very sparingly. Thus, it was possible to achieve a balance in the use of their attributes for crystallizing knowledge and encouraging new attitudes in the receivers regarding prevention of STD/AIDS.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Popular lettering in Recife: an analysis of its pictorial elements
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO-INGLES: Popular lettering in Recife: an analysis of its pictorial elements

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: 6th Information Design International Conference
DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: Proceedings of the 6th Information Design International Conference

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Within an urban setting of the city of Recife, popular signwriters represent a significant part of local material culture, especially since they have managed to resist both time and cultural and technological renovations. Although information design has played an important role with regard to preserving and studying these versatile systems of vernacular urban information, nonetheless this type of graphic manifestation is still generally viewed with little regard, and is constantly associated with something undertaken on the margins of cultured knowledge. Amongst the graphic elements encountered in our study, particular emphasis is paid to the pictorial elements, consisting of illustrations or drawings of various configurations analyzed and classified morphologically into thirteen categories - three of which are addressed in this article: range, kinetics and naturalism (Ashwin, 1979). Such elements were cataloged in an online system especially developed for this purpose, totaling 72 pictorial elements taken from 115 signs. The main results highlighted by this analysis are the online tool developed, the validation of certain assumptions, which were already inherent to popular signwriters, and the discovery of certain artistic and visual peculiarities, which would otherwise go unnoticed by a less attentive observer

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO-INGLES: Information design in the innovation process of the textile and clothing industries

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: 6th Information Design International Conference
DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: Proceedings of the 6th Information Design International Conference

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Nanotechnology has become one of the most common innovations within the textile and clothing industry. Therefore, it is essential to understand how these new technologies are perceived by users, so that designers may develop artifacts that are suitable for their physical and emotional needs. However, in order to understand the relationship between the user and new products being developed with nanotechnology, the textile and clothing (T&C) industry requires certain answers. Thus, this paper presents a number of reflections on the manner in which man perceives the object. In this particular case, the clothing-object, which contains the technology in their materiality, and that in certain aspects related to the value, may contribute to the selection of the product. Additionally, this article also seeks to reveal how information design professionals may improve the user interface with these objects.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Information design in digital games
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO-INGLES: Information design in digital games

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: 6th Information Design International Conference
DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: Proceedings of the 6th Information Design International Conference

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: With the development of the digital games industry, and the increasing complexity of the projects involved, new paradigms have begun to permeate its production. Therefore, an increasing need has emerged to improve the quality of games, which should be intuitive in their interaction, through a user-friendly interface, thus providing an appropriate experience. Consequently, it is important to perceive that the flow of information is evident at every moment, since digital games, with all their elements, may also be classified as information systems. Hence, information design has become one of the main elements in the structure of digital games, and should be taken into account as a way of developing a better project, which facilitates the development of products so as to ensure the correct understanding and legibility of information. This study refers to an analysis of the relationship between digital games and information design, in which several other factors are involved, interconnected by aspects such as user experience, interaction and interface. As a result of this analysis, a strong influence has been perceived in the manner in which information is related to digital games and user experience, through the established channels by interaction and interface design.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: The Information, Instrucional and Interaction Design from the perspective of use in Learning Digital Artifacts
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO-INGLES: The Information, Instrucional and Interaction Design from the perspective of use in Learning Digital Artifacts

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: 6th Information Design International Conference
DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: Proceedings of the 6th Information Design International Conference

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This article gives an overview of the preliminary convergence between Information, Instructional and Interaction Designs. Additional discussions and comparisons on their concepts, key terms and phases of the procedural methodology are investigated. Besides, it is performed a comparative analysis between the Principles of Design Information (Redig, 2004), Principles of Usability (Nielsen, 2001) and Principles of Electronic Learning in Multimedia (Filatro, 2008). Thus, areas of shading between these fields of knowledge are unveiled, thereby pointing to a need for their integration in planning and developing the educational digital artifacts.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO-INGLES: Slides presentations and Information Design: uses beyond the artefact

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: Proceedings of the 6th Information Design International Conference

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This article presents a contemporary discussion concerning the digital slide presentations throughout a bibliographical review. In the first topic, along with the definition of the object we presented some of its characteristics related to its historical path. Following, some critics and discussions about the artefact are addressed, as well as researches derived from them. We conclude with recommendations to promote the effective and motivating slideshows design.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Through the graphical analysis of periodicals created and published in Recife during the 1920s, in the state of Pernambuco, this research seeks to indicate how information on fashion and consumption was portrayed in the life of the city. In the advertisements for fashion products it identifies the representation of the artifacts created and the manner in which it was publicized through the local periodicals published throughout the decade. The present study aims to undertake a graphical analysis of the fashion advertisements published in the periodicals A Pilhйria, Rua Nova and Revista da Cidade during the 1920s, relating these graphical artifacts to both the social context and the period during which they appeared. The aim of this has been to strengthen the studies on Brazilian graphic memory, including graphical artifacts from various locations around the country, in this case Pernambuco, as representational instruments of our society, culture and history.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO-INGLES: The relationship of experts and non-experts users with text typefaces: distinction and assignment of subjective concepts

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: 7th Information Design International Conference
DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: Proceedings of the 7th Information Design International Conference

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The basic purpose of this research is to explore the semantic possibilities of text typefaces and understanding how this significant potential is seen by the two main groups of users of fonts: experts and non-experts. To this end, questionnaires were conducted with 40 expert users and 40 non-expert users, graphic designers and people from different professions, using for the test 12 text fonts. Questionnaires investigate, at first, if users can perceive differences between the text fonts, and later, if they can assign subjective characteristics to them. The article presents the construction process of this study and its main conclusions.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Variбveis para anбlise de infogrбficos interativos: um estudo descritivo em artefatos educacionais para o ensino mйdio
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO-INGLES: Variables for analyzing interactive infographics: a descriptive study of educational artefacts for secondary school

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: Proceedings of the 7th Information Design International Conference

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: With the main aim of understanding how interactive digital infographics are presented in high school educational materials, this paper presents the development and application of a method for analyzing digital infographics. The method was developed based on the intersection of variables identified in recent studies by Rajamanickam Venkatesh (2005) and Alberto Cairo (2013). These authors have gone beyond the description of static infographics, introducing variables that consider aspects of digital media, thus for example, helping to identify infographics as interactive and classify their interaction style. The constructed method was applied to a descriptive study on part of a collection of digital educational materials. The method proved to be suitable for the study purpose and contributed to an initial contact analysis regarding the infographics encountered. By applying this method, it was demonstrated that the digital materials offered to students contain few interactive infographics, and that they only provide a tentative exploration of the interaction styles possible in the digital environment.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Levantamento bibliogrбfico: anбlise comparativa entre metodologias de design da informaзгo e jogos didбticos e nгo didбticos de tabuleiro
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO-INGLES: Bibliographical survey: comparative analysis between information design methodologies and educational and noneducational board games

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: Proceedings of the 7th Information Design International Conference

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This article presents a comparative analysis of methodologies for developing educational and noneducational games, specifically board games, and information design methodologies proposed by Redish (2000), Sless (2005) and Simlinger (2007), seeking to identify the inclusion of information design in the process. With the aid of a comparative framework, we analysed three methodologies used to develop educational games: Carneiro & Lopes (2007), Mendes et al. (2009) and Medeiros (2013), as well as two methodologies for noneducational games: Albuquerque (2010) and CTCD (2013). The nature of this study is bibliographical, exploratory and analytical, although viewed from a subjective perspective.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO-INGLES: Considerations about Almirante Collection (Pernambuco, Rio de Janeiro and Sгo Paulo)

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This article presents notes about the Almirante Collection. This collection is composed by brazilian cachaзa labels and consists an interesting universe to study design history. The notes made up here are the result of part of the research conducted by Almeida (2013), who studied specimens of this collection, belonging to the states of Sгo Paulo, Rio de Janeiro and Pernambuco. To follow up on these studies, it was necessary to know well the collection in order to determine a sample consciously. This study resulted in data that can be used as basis for new studies. Thus, we will focus here on the history of the collection, characteristics of its organization, as well as notes on its categorization and observations made up on the similarity in the visual organization of the labels.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This article aims to answer the following question: How are readability tests performed with beginning readers? The article will also discuss the manner in which information researchers/designers, focussing on legibility and readability studies, should behave in tests with children. We conducted a review of the literature on the techniques that are most employed for this field of study, including descriptions of several studies conducted in the UK and Brazil involving children?s reading. As a result, three major problems were identified: (a) aspects related to the behaviour of beginning readers during the experimental process, for example, the fact that children tire quickly while testing; (b) consistency in the use of preferred tests, and (c) the importance of the researcher?s participation regarding the research and those being researched.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Surrounded by a reality in which the forms of produce and circulate information change increasingly dynamic, the roles of student, teacher, the ways of learning and the knowledge itself, also are increasingly changing, bringing forth new dilemmas and contradictions, as new devices, technologies, artifacts - and the use made of them - take place on traditional educational spaces and the world, offering new cognitive possibilities. We are living a time in which it?s urgent to rethink the ways of teaching, highlighting the role of schools in educating the individual to this new scenario. The Design (emphasising its informational aspect) can play an important role in this direction; through a systematic, organizational and prospective view of its own activity, it would be possible to bring new perspectives on the ability of students to deal with this growing complexity of the world.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Legibilidade e leiturabilidade: a correlaзгo entre leitura e escrita a partir de opiniхes de professores do ensino fundamental
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO-INGLES: Legibility and readability: the correlation between reading and writing from the opinions of primary school teachers

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: Proceedings of the 7th Information Design International Conference

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The aim of this article is to describe and discuss the opinions of first and second year elementary school teachers regarding the processes involved in teaching reading and writing, using qualitative questionnaires. A literature review was conducted about the subject. In addition to this, important considerations were also included relating reading and writing. It was observed that teachers have much to contribute to research, and are essential when seeking to obtain greater knowledge of reading acquisition in beginning readers. Furthermore, we also realized how important it is to consider aspects regarding the teaching of writing in research involving legibility and readability.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This paper problematizes the analysis of digital slideshows from the perspective of Information Design. Initially, we discuss research into slideshows and the few analytical instruments that exist regarding this subject. We also present the analytical tool we have created, and which was tested in a study involving undergraduates of Letters and Sciences at the UFPE, Recife, Brazil. We observed that the tool proved to be both valid for evaluating slideshows and versatile for studies on information design, despite the existence of categories that could be removed.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO-INGLES: The 3D printing contributing in information design projects
